text: James P. McCarthy (born March 7, 1935) is a retired United States Air Force general. He was Deputy Commander in Chief of the United States European Command. He was the ARDI Professor of National Security at the United States Air Force Academy. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:Educators from Ohio Category:American military personnel of the Korean War Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:Military people from Ohio Category:People from Canton, Ohio
title: James P. McCarthy
